ack.title: ACKNOWLEDGMENTS
ack.p: This work was supported by the European Union 7th Framework Projects REFRESH under contract no. 244121 and MARS under contract no. 603378 (Annette Baattrup‐Pedersen). We thank the landowners, water boards, and nature organizations for kindly allowing us to use their areas for our experiments, Marlene Venø Skjærbæk, Henrik Stenholt, Uffe Mensberg, and several students for hardwork constructing the dams, Helena Kallestrup, Tinna Christensen and Juana Jacobsen for figure layout, Anne Mette Poulsen for editorial support and Frederik Hansen Baattrup for making the final editorial changes. The company AstroTurf ® is acknowledged for sponsoring seed mats.
